codeReview.summary: The feature adds .relatedTo() on CommandBuilder, stores relationship metadata on commands, introduces action-graph helpers and tier-4 hint generators, and includes a minor changeset with targeted tests. However, the action graph implementation does not traverse nested commands, so it does not actually cover all registered commands.

issues.description: buildActionGraph only iterates program.commands (top-level) and never recurses into subcommands. This omits nested registered commands from graph nodes/edges, can mislabel valid nested targets as unknown, and yields incomplete tier-4 hints for real CLIs with grouped subcommands.

summary: Fail: implementation is close, but graph construction misses nested registered commands, which leaves the OS-357 requirement ('all registered commands') partially unmet.
